title: Serif from magazine logo L'Espresso
content:
My guess that this is Clarendon, but it’s a bit too heavy or bold

Tnx

comments.content: I think it’s Rockwell, but the apostrophe is different.

This is Ziggurat from Hoefler and Frere-Jones:  
 [http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100028](http://web.archive.org/web/20090826221356/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100028 "http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100028")
